Fantasy 











 





Not done yet
 




Nowitzki has a huge fourth quarter to lift the Mavs.  (Getty Images)



    

    

      The game is all but over. Golden State is about to leave Dallas with a 
      huge win. Not if Dirk Nowitzki has 
      anything to say about it, Tony Mejia says. The 
      superstar leads a 15-0 run to close the game in the Mavs' 
      118-112 victory.
    

  
 Related Links:• Series | NJ-TOR: Raptors take Game 5 | Guard Ford injured | Series• Mejia: Reflections | Hey Tony! | Wins:  Cavaliers | Spurs | Rockets


 


 

 





 Power Rankings: Central door opens for Milwaukee


    

      
      The Bucs, Reds and Astros (sans the Rocket) don't have the horses. The 
      Cubs, bad. The Cards, 
      hurting. And the Brew Crew have a golden opportunity, Eric Mack 
      says.
    

  
• MIL: Routs Cards | Page | Central notes | Pennings


 

 





 Board game: Vikings follow plan and nail their draft


    

      
      Adrian Peterson or Brady Quinn? Sidney Rice or Dwayne Jarrett? When faced 
      with these decisions, the Vikes stay true to their draft 
      board and hit it big, Clark Judge says.
